Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.jsword

Interface JSwordModuleService

All Known Implementing Classes:
JSwordModuleServiceImpl
public interface JSwordModuleService
The service providing access to JSword. All JSword calls should preferably be placed in this service

  • Method Details

    • getInstalledModules

      List<org.crosswire.jsword.book.Book> getInstalledModules(org.crosswire.jsword.book.BookCategory... bibleCategory)
      looks up any installed module
      Parameters:
      bibleCategory - the categories of the modules to be returned
      Returns:
      a list of bible books

    • getInstalledModules

      List<org.crosswire.jsword.book.Book> getInstalledModules(boolean allVersions, String locale, org.crosswire.jsword.book.BookCategory... bibleCategory)
      looks up any installed module
      Parameters:
      bibleCategory - the categories of the modules to be returned
      allVersions - indicates all versions of the bible
      locale - specifies a particular language of interest + defaults
      Returns:
      a list of bible books

    • isInstalled

      boolean isInstalled(String... moduleInitials)
      Using module initials, checks whether the module has been installed
      Parameters:
      moduleInitials - the initials of the modules to check for installation state
      Returns:
      true if the module is installed

    • installBook

      void installBook(int installerIndex, String version)
      Kicks of a process to install this version
      Parameters:
      installerIndex - the index of the installer to use
      version - version to be installs

    • installBook

      void installBook(String version)
      Kicks of a process to install this version
      Parameters:
      version - version to be installs

    • getProgressOnInstallation

      double getProgressOnInstallation(String bookName)
      assesses the progress made on an installation
      Parameters:
      bookName - the book name
      Returns:
      the percentage of completion (0 - 1.0)

    • getProgressOnIndexing

      double getProgressOnIndexing(String bookName)
      assesses the progress made on an indexing operation
      Parameters:
      bookName - the book name
      Returns:
      the percentage of completion (0 - 1.0)

    • getAllModules

      List<org.crosswire.jsword.book.Book> getAllModules(int installerIndex, org.crosswire.jsword.book.BookCategory... bookCategory)
      retrieves all modules that have been installed
      Parameters:
      bookCategory - the list of categories to be included
      installerIndex - the index of the installer to use
      Returns:
      all modules whether installed or not

    • reloadInstallers

      void reloadInstallers()
      reloads all installers TODO - user should be warned USERS SHOULD BE WARNED ABOUT THIS AS IT LOOKS UP INFORMATION ON THE INTERNET

    • index

      void index(String initials)
      indexes a book
      Parameters:
      initials - the initials of the book to index

    • reIndex

      void reIndex(String initials)
      re-indexes a book
      Parameters:
      initials - the initials of the book to index

    • isIndexed

      boolean isIndexed(String versions)
      Checks whether a module is indexed
      Parameters:
      versions - version to be indexed
      Returns:
      true if the module has been indexed

    • getInstallers

      List<org.crosswire.jsword.book.install.Installer> getInstallers()
      This method is deliberately placed at the top of the file to raise awareness that sensitive countries may not wish to access the internet.

      If the installation is set to "offline", then only return the offline installers.

      Returns:
      a set of installers

    • setOffline

      void setOffline(boolean offline)
      Parameters:
      offline - true to set the installation to be off-line only.

    • removeModule

      void removeModule(String initials)
      Removes a module
      Parameters:
      initials - initials of the module to remove, e.g. 'WEB'

    • waitForIndexes

      void waitForIndexes(String... versions)
      Provides a way of waiting for indexes to be created
      Parameters:
      versions - versions to be waited upon

    • addDirectoryInstaller

      BibleInstaller addDirectoryInstaller(String directoryPath)
      Creates and returns a directory installer
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - installs modules from a directory
      Returns:
      the directory installer index
